thread.title: BRIEF-Indiabulls Housing Finance Dec Qtr Consol Profit Rises

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Indiabulls Housing Finance Dec Qtr Consol Profit Rises

organizations.name: brief-indiabulls housing finance dec qtr consol profit rises

text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - Indiabulls Housing Finance Ltd:
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL PROFIT 11.68 BILLION RUPEES * DEC QUARTER CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 33.49 BILLION RUPEES
* CONSOL PROFIT IN DEC QUARTER LAST YEAR WAS 7.51 BILLION RUPEES; CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS WAS 25.86 BILLION RUPEES
* DECLARED INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 14 RUPEES PER SHARE Source text - bit.ly/2DBZ8gV Further company coverage:
